name: Shagreen Baby Crib with Brass Accents
description: The storm baby crib by Kifu Paris is the ultimate luxury piece for your child's bedroom. Inspired by the birth of her first child, Kifu Augousti designed this piece to embrace the whimsical world of a child. The piece is inlaid in cream shagreen with bronze-patina brass details. The mattress is included with the piece and includes a large drawer at the bottom for practical use. Other variations available. Currently made to order 8-10 weeksDesign SKU Reference KCRB01The dimensions of this piece are 125 x 63 x 98.5 cmCustom sizing/finishing available on request.All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. ·     Wipe clean with soft dry cloth·     Made in Philippines Kifu uses handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, materials she experienced as a child growing up in her parent's studio, but interpreted in a younger quirkier way reflecting her youth.
